name: Click the Button 2: Revenge of the Button
name_original: Click the Button 2: Revenge of the Button
description:
Oh no! The button strikes back again! Use your fast and skilled mouse cursor to click on it to destroy it for good! (WARNING: The button is really, REALLY fast, and I MEAN IT.)

For some reason, this game is not available for download. You can play it directly on your browser, though!
